document_data.name: ''Belt of Wisdom''
document_data.mainbody: The '''belt of wisdom''' was a powerful [[magic]]al belt that could be found in the Realms ''circa'' the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The belt was decorated with a series of [[owl]] feathers along its form. The buckle was rather plain in appearance, but smoothed out like a textless [[scroll]].
document_data.Powers: It greatly bolstered the mental capacity of the wearer so they could attain greater understanding and perspective on issues they faced.
document_data.Reputation: Along with the ''[[Cloak of the Protector]]'', this belt was part of a set of powerful [[artifact]]s referred to as the "Great Protector".
